Wracked with joint pain, is facing knee - replacement surgery — and it ’ s largely because the sex - swapping celeb still refuses to give up her beloved stiletto high heels, RadarOnline. com can exclusively reveal! “ Her doctors beg her to give up her stiletto collection, but she refuses! ” spilled a pal.
